metadata.title: 7 Underrated Channels to Follow on YouTube | Towards Data Science
metadata.h1: 7 Underrated Channels to Follow on YouTube
metadata.description: 7 Underrated Channels to Follow on YouTube. Best resources on data science, machine learning & deep learning.

all_paragraphs: Artificial Intelligence, Data Science is an ocean of topics bundled up together which include the likes of Statistics, Maths, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Cloud, Programming knowledge, Domain knowledge, and a never-ending list. It is comprehensive, and the research in these fields are emerging every day. The popularity has reached its peak since its declaration “the sexiest job of the twenty-first century” by the Harvard Business Review.

Many a time we are often confused and we ask this question to ourselves where do I start? What are the best resources to master this field? We come across many hurdles and with my personal experience just one resource ain’t good enough to even understand a topic as simple as Linear regression.

In this article, I have bundled some of the best creators who are underrated on YouTube but are prominent leaders in the fields of Artificial Intelligence & Data Science. YouTube is a great platform to acquire any kind of knowledge. The only investment is your time. No Monthly Subscriptions, just pure added value to your life in a few minutes.

The creators listed have an arsenal of techniques with a wide range of topics covered. It includes right from your theoretical knowledge of any topics related to Artificial Intelligence & Data Science to getting a job or cracking your interviews. This article is your one-stop destination to master the field.

Krish Naik is a Lead Data Scientist, pioneering in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Computer Vision. He is the complete package. He explains each and every topic with many real-world scenarios right from theoretical knowledge to the practical aspect of it. He has a pool of projects in his arsenal & an active contributor to the community. Krish is the next go-to guy who delivers sincerely day after day.

Abhishek Thakur is a chief data scientist, world’s first “four times kaggle grandmaster”. He completely focuses on applied machine learning, deep learning, and data science. He is a great problem solver. His videos on YouTube are just pure magic and it will help you solve problems like a pro. He has also recently published a book on “How to Approach any Machine Learning Problem” which is an absolute masterclass.

Code Basics is a YouTube channel that delivers a wide range of tools and technology like TensorFlow, PowerBI, Python, Data Structures, and Algorithms. The practical sessions are quite intuitive and simple to understand. Apart from that he holds various meetups with other Data Scientists and gives career guidance on fields of Artificial Intelligence & Data Science.

AIEngineering another great YouTube channel that covers a lot of end to end projects especially dealing with tools and technologies such as Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Data Engineering, Dev Ops, Model Deployment, Cloud, and ML/AI Business use cases (Overview and Implementation). The videos are in-depth that provide a detailed yet simple explanation of the subject.

BAM!!!! It’s become an iconic word. StatQuest with Joshua Starmer is a YouTube channel that will help you understand complicated Statistics and Machine Learning concepts in an easy way. The concepts are very well divided into multiple small entertaining videos, which makes learning more simplified. The ideal learning experience is designed to fit our life’s pace. He’s a great teacher as well as a great entertainer too.

Springboard India is a YouTube channel, this channel is centered towards the fact that education should prepare us for the real world & that working on meaningful projects under the guidance of industry experts is one of the best ways to get there. In this channel, they share explainer videos, career advice & interviews with real-life practitioners of data science, AI, machine learning, and data analytics.

Data Professor is a YouTube channel of Chanin Nantasenamat. He has done a Ph.D. and is an Associate Professor of Bioinformatics at a Research University where he leads a research laboratory that harnesses data science for unraveling the hidden knowledge of big data in medicine. Here you will get Data Science contents consisting of explainer videos and practical tutorials. The main aim of the channel is to help students and data enthusiasts learn about Data Science and how it can be used to make sense of data.

The above creators are some of the established data scientists in their domains and also the emerging ones on YouTube. Its high time we should enlighten ourselves with the knowledge and resources they are providing which is an absolute world-class. Data Science is a hot topic and as one of the top American entrepreneurs, Mark Cuban said “if we don’t learn or invest in Artificial Intelligence and use it to solve business problems or real-world use cases we will risk becoming a dinosaur”. Data and AI will drive the future it is better to be a part of the trend and not miss out on opportunities. Thank you :)
Your home for data science. A Medium publication sharing concepts, ideas and codes.
